Write an essay on one of the following. You must base your answer on the cultural options or literary
options you have studied in class. References to other subjects or literary works are permissible but should
not form the main body of your answer.

Language and culture

1.    Give examples from your study of this option of ways in which different cultures and languages
      influence each other. Demonstrate what benefits result from this.


2.    In the light of your study of this option, how would you convince someone who is monolingual,
      and proud of being so, to at least get to know another language?



Media and culture

3.    Some advertising just encourages prejudice and discrimination. Discuss examples you have come
      across in your study of the media.


4.    In what ways can the Internet be used both for and against freedom? Discuss with reference to
      examples you have come across in your study of the media.



Future issues

5.    Future issues often have ethical aspects. Explain some of the ethical questions raised by topics you
      have studied for this option.



Global issues

6.    How does nationalism, patriotism, or just plain selfishness work against the resolution of some of the
      global issues you have studied?



Social issues

7.    According to you, what are the welfare priorities now in a society or societies with which you
      are familiar? Give examples from your study of this option.

Literary questions

8.    It is not always easy to forgive and forget. Illustrate this observation with reference to the literary
      works studied.


9.    Explain what makes you admire any of the individuals encountered in the literary texts you
      have studied.


10.   Does good always triumph over evil in the literary works you have studied?
